item.description:
For August's brunch we'll return to the Wharf Tavern in Warren.

This is a buffet brunch for $19.95 per person

Here's the link for their website but the brunch menu is not shown. 

http://www.thewharftavernri.com/

The restaurant is under new management and they have just recently started serving brunch again.

There are omelets made to order and a carving station....and the usual brunch offerings.  And they have dishes that change week to week.  Today was a seafood newberg.

It's right on the water so it will be a nice place to enjoy an August meal.

See you there !
item.name: August Brunch - Wharf Tavern in Warren
